name: @things-scene/form
description: An element providing a starting point for your own reusable Polymer elements.

scripts.serve: watchify src/*.js -o things-scene-form.js src/index.js & polymer serve
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o things-scene-form.js && uglifyjs things-scene-form.js -o things-scene-form-min.js

author: heartyoh@hatiolab.com
